general.headline: Data Strategy | End-to-End Analytics | Data Science | Machine Learning
general.description: • strategic data team builder with analytical management leadership• machine learning and data science expert with broad technical knowledge• product developer for business outcome with digital focus• business partner with passion in education

jobs.description:
• Develop Enterprise Data and Analytics Strategy 
• Build Analytics capability and teams 
• Deliver End2End data analytics service and solutions across all business units 
• Build Data Analytics platform on Prem & Cloud 
• Uplift Enterprise Data Analytics maturity

jobs.jobTitle: Co-Founder | Chief Technology Officer | Chief Data & Analytics Officer

jobs.description: A community supporting women in Data Science & Data Analytics
Mentoring motivated PhD students in data science and related area in a one year industry mentoring program.

jobs.jobTitle: Head of Data Science & Machine Learning | Head of Enterprise Data & Analytics
jobs.description:
• Developed an Enterprise Data & Analytics Strategy including data foundation capabilities for the technology, operating model for the business, use case pipeline for the enterprise (as a senior leader reporting to CIO)
• Build a new Data & Analytics Centre of Excellence function (later as CDO office) including data governance, data engineering, data visualisation and advanced analytics
• Established a new Enterprise data governance function, including designing, directing and overseeing data & analytics related classification and process
• Established a new Advanced Analytics function, including Machine Learning and AI roadmap, practise and capability including data scientists and machine learning engineers
• Worked as a trusted partner with business directly by providing guidance on upcoming trends in Machine Learning and AI to create value within their business domain
• Provided leadership and expertise to uplift end to end solution delivery with industry best practice across platforms
• Managed data migration from multiple systems to Azure to enable End to End solution development
• Developed a new analytics academy & data literacy uplift program 
• Led people and practice through change and transformation

jobs.jobTitle: Principal Data Scientist | Senior Manager Advanced Analytics
jobs.description:
• Build data & analytics transformation strategy
• Develop big data technology plan and implementation 
• Build advanced analytics & automation solutions
• Data ethics framework & responsible AI

jobs.jobTitle: Senior Manager Advanced Analytics | Principal & Lead Data Scientist
Senior Analytical Quality Engineer | Data Scientist

jobs.description:
Developed and taught Business Analytics, Business Intelligence, Data Mining courses. 
Supervised postgraduate industry based projects.

allSkills: Data Mining, Data Analysis, Time Series Analysis, Research, Statistics, Machine Learning, Analytics, Strategy, Project Management, Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, Business Analysis, Consulting, Business Intelligence, Statistical Modeling, Programming, Business Process Improvement, Modeling, Banking, Agile Methodologies, SAS Programming, Mathematical Modeling, Quantitative Analytics, Computer Science, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), Data Modeling, Data Warehousing, Change Management, Business Analytics, Data Management, Business Transformation, Data Science, Information Technology, Algorithms, SAS, SQL, Enterprise Software, Python, R, LaTeX, Management, Stakeholder Management, Leadership, Team Leadership, Predictive Analytics, Predictive Modeling
